**AHS:** `arr_dep`|**Schiphol:** The first 2 digits are taken.

**AHS:**

  • When `arr_dep` is “D“,
    then `outBoundCarrier` is set to "XQ".

  • When `arr_dep` is “A“,
    then Data Handling Operation.| |outBoundFlightNumber|`Turnaround Insights API`|`Turnaround AHS API`|**Schiphol:** `flight_designator_outbound`
    **AHS:** `arr_dep`, `fln`|**Schiphol:** The part that comes after the first 2 digits is taken.

    **AHS:**

    • When `arr_dep` is “D“,
      then `outBoundFlightNumber` is set to the part that
      comes after the space character of `fln`.

    • When `arr_dep` is “A“,
      then Data Handling Operation.| |regId|`Turnaround Insights API`| |**Schiphol:** `aircraft_registration`|**AHS:** Data Handling Operation | |scheduledDate| | | |**Schiphol:** N/A in the source system.

      **AHS:** N/A in the source system.| |actualDate|`Turnaround Insights API`|`Turnaround AHS API`|**Schiphol:**`timestamp`

      **AHS:** `station`| | |ramp|`Turnaround Insights API`| |**Schiphol:** `ramp`|**AHS:** N/A in the source system.| |rampStatus|`Turnaround Insights API`| |**Schiphol:** `ramp_status`|**AHS:** N/A in the source system.| |groundHandler|`Turnaround Insights API`| |**Schiphol:** `ramp_status`|**AHS:** This field is set to “AHS“.| # Fuel Milestones Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve all `FuelMilestonesFile` files #### - Source Directory * `FuelMilestonesFTP` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger**: Each new file enters the directory **Steps**: Retrieve `FuelMilestonesFile` files #### - Data Handling Operation * `udorLocal` and `flightId` are retrieved from the RiverX Flight Leg Data Model using the values mapped according to the following conditions(
